name: Pokémon Center
text: Remove all damage counters from all of your own Pokémon with damage counters on them, then discard all Energy cards attached to those Pokémon.

effect.text: Remove all damage counters from all of your own Pokémon with damage counters on them, then discard all Energy cards attached to those Pokémon.

strengths: Heals ALL damage from ALL your Pokemon
weaknesses: Discards all Energy from healed Pokemon
synergies: Alakazam Damage Swap - Move damage first

competitiveHistory: Pokémon Center was essential in Alakazam Damage Swap decks, where damage would be consolidated onto one Pokemon with no Energy before using the Center.

rulings.ruling: Only Pokemon with damage counters are affected.
All Energy is discarded from Pokemon that had damage removed.
Pokemon with no damage counters keep their Energy.
